channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping, 8th December
item.description:
There has been rubbish fly tipped on corner of Albury st and Mary Ann gardens for some weeks, could you please clear

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mary Ann Gardens, Deptford, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside Orientalist / 4 Qubes, 8th December
item.description:
Very large and deep pothole, difficult to see in the dark, and just before turning onto Lady Somerset Road. Genuine hazard and currently causing significant issues and already has lead to injuries to cyclists.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 53-79, Highgate Road, Kentish Town, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Poor workmanship, 8th December
item.description:
After felling a dead tree outside 2 Balchier Road, the council recently “fixed” the pavement. However, it’s been poorly done and is a trip hazard

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Balchier Road, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge pothole almost cracked my wheel, 8th December
item.description:
There is a huge pothole just after the zebra crossing in a blind spot, I have smashed my car wheel there twice now and it needs to be addressed urgently. I have a 4x4 if I was a cyclist or a motorcyclist I would have injured myself.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Salusbury Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Utility Works and Temporary Traffic Lights

item.title: Thurlow Hill SE21 yellow plastic Lambeth grit bin, 8th December
item.description:
Thurlow Hill SE21 yellow plastic Lambeth grit bin next to house number 74 / opposite side of the road to Lambeth streetlight ID number 9. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for picture and Google Streeview link. https://www.google.com/maps/place/82+Thurlow+Hill,+Norwood,+London+SE21+8JN/@51.4415233,-0.1010623,3a,75y,59.66h,79.02t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1snp9oaqgLWgRX3rot3VLoDA!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D10.981155469411505%26panoid%3Dnp9oaqgLWgRX3rot3VLoDA%26yaw%3D59.659362867233746!7i16384!8i8192!4m6!3m5!1s0x4876040f61c61935:0x146f51eadbff3295!8m2!3d51.4414757!4d-0.101254!16s%2Fg%2F11n06wpkfh?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MTIwMi4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thurlow Hill, Tulse Hill, Greater London

item.title: VRM - SP14VNS flytipping, 8th December
item.description:
This vrm SP14VNS has been seen fly tipping in the spinel court communal bin area. A neighbour caught them and when questioned they claimed to live at flat 16 which is a lie as that is my flat. Can you come and remove all the dumped items that this scum bag has left please.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Richmer Road, Slade Green, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: At top right of Carlingford Road, close to the junction of Willoughby, 8th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Carlingford Road, Belsize Park, Greater London

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 103a, Camley Street, King's Cross, Greater London

item.description:
